features: Jeans for women high waist mom jeans with button fly closure and frayed design.
LookbookStore high rise wide leg jeans for women feature with ripped details, high waistline, regular fit, button fly and classic 5 pockets.
These double breasted high waist skinny jeans are made of stretch, breathable and soft material, Stretch design highlights your body curve by slimming the hips and thighs.
LookbookStore boyfriend jeans for women loose fit are suitable for daily wear, casual, going out, party, concert, club, holiday or date night, ect.

The 90s clothes for women follow the standard US sizes. Size X-Small fits size 0 - size 2. Size Small fits size 4 - size 6, size Medium fits size 8 - size 10, size Large fits size 12 - size 14, size X-Large fits size 16 - size 18, size XX-Large fits size 20 - size 22.

Easy to pair with with all tops from colored outfit to basic T-shirts, blouses, crop top, pullover sweater, sweatshirt, outwear coat and heels to show your own styles. What's the size reference of this women flare jeans? These baggy jeans run true to standard US Size, Size Small fits size 4 to size 6, Size Medium fits size 8 to size 10, Size Large fits size 12 to size 14, Size X-Large fits size 16 to size 18, Size XX-Large fits size 20 to size 22. What is the inseam/length on these women wide leg jeans? The inseam of our wide leg jeans is 32" of each size. The outseam is Small 41.7", Medium 42.2", Large 42.5", X-Large 43", XX-Large 43.3". If there are belt loops on this high waisted jeans? These women high waisted jeans have belt loops. What’s the material of the high waisted flare jeans? The material of these high waisted flare jeans is 72% Cotton, 26% Polyester, 2% Spandex. Will these button fly jeans shrink? These women button fly jeans will not shrink, they are made of stretchy material and fit perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these jeans they’re the best! I’m 5’5” and about 145lbs with an athletic build so I have muscular thighs and hips but these have a little stretch and I debated between small and medium and glad I got the small! They look great with both my Chelsea boots and athletic shoes! So comfortable and not flared just a great wide leg, button fly, boot cut jean that takes me back to my teenage years but without the low rise part lol 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING JEANS... size down if you don't want them baggy
reviews.reviewText: I know I read literally all the reviews before purchasing listing, so I wanted to leave an honest review. I am 180 pounds and 5 foot tall. It said I should order a large so I did and then I return them for a medium and they fit perfect. They are a bit long but nothing that can't be handled with a heel... they are very stretchy, but they don't look like leggings. They look like a great pair of distressed jeans! I like most women struggle to find a good pair of jeans, and I can't imagine mini body types of these would not work for the materials. Great, they wash and dry great and I definitely recommend again if you want a baggy or fit, the large would be OK but the medium surprisingly fit me and I like the thinner fit :-) get them ladies!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish Comfy Jeans
reviews.reviewText: For reference I am 5 ft 6 in and 138 lbs. I love that these are high waist ed they fit great & there is a lot of stretch in them so extra comfy. I knocked off one star because the sizes are not accurate. I order the black in medium, and it fit loose. I kept it anyway. Then I ordered a small in denim & beige The beige fit perfect but shrunk in the wash and tight after being washed. There is enough stretch so it's still is okay to wear. the denim was too loose so I figured I would wash it and it would shrink like the beige. It didn't! So they're great jeans however there's no guarantee what size you will actually get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these, way too big, returned them for a small, I’m 170 and 5’5” and the fit is perfect! Love them! So comfy and can dress them up or down! Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These jeans are cute and fit well, but the color is absolutely not as advertised. They are lighter and a little more dirty looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite jeans
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these jeans. They are my new favorite jeans in my closet. I feel like I am a difficult fit (often gap at the waist in the back) and they fit perfectly. Perfect amount of stretch. They look great with both boots and shoes. I found these to be true to size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am 5'9" and 156 lbs. I ordered the large size, and they are really too big. I decided to keep them anyway and try to shrink them down. The material is very soft and stretchy. They look great and they are not that ripped as to draw major attention to you. This is the first pair of ripped jeans I have owned. So far, so good. I asked my son if I was too old to wear them and he laughed and so, "No, mom, they make you look younger". Probably flattering me, but I bought it anyway. You are only as old as you feel. The color is dark to lighter blue and looks perfect. One of the features that these jeans have are the cool buttons. Nice purchase, and if you want something a little more fitting, order a size down.
Love the style and the fit.
